title: An Unending Claim
description: A deadly secret.An unrelenting shifter.An unending claim…Peyton knows we are meant to be, but an old wound, one that’s buried beneath the secrets that she keeps, prevent her from completing our bond. It’s time to tear down her walls and convince her that she’s mine. Forever.Trust.Acceptance.Fate.Enemies attack us from all sides, but it’s her past that’s determined to take her from me. I won’t let that happen.I need her with me.Where she belongs.Where I can protect her... and the future of our pack.***The conclusion to Nathan and Peyton's story (I promise!)
author: Elle Christensen
